query.queryVal:
select min(starttime/1000)*1000 as 'round_minutes', dateformat(starttime, 'dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:00') as 'DateByMinute', sum(eventcount)/60 as 'TotalEventsEPS', count(*)/60 as 'CoalescedEventsEPS' from events
where
logsourceid>69
group by DateByMinute
order by round_minutes desc
last 30 minutes

select min(starttime/1000)*1000 as 'round_minutes', logsourcename(logsourceid) as 'LogSource', dateformat(starttime, 'dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:00') as 'DateByMinute', sum(eventcount)/60 as 'TotalEventsEPS', count(*)/60 as 'CoalescedEventsEPS' from events
where
logsourceid>69
and DateByMinute in
(select DateByMinute from (select dateformat(starttime, 'dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:00') as 'DateByMinute', sum(eventcount)/60 as 'TotalEventsEPS', count(*)/60 as 'CoalescedEventsEPS'
from events
where
logsourceid > 69
group by DateByMinute
last 12 hours)
where
(TotalEventsEPS > {Maximum EPS} or CoalescedEventsEPS > {Maximum EPS}))
group by LogSource, DateByMinute
having (TotalEventsEPS > ({Maximum EPS}*{Percentage of maximum EPS}/100) or CoalescedEventsEPS > ({Maximum EPS}*{Percentage of maximum EPS}/100))
order by round_minutes, TotalEventsEPS asc
last 12 hours

select min(starttime/1000)*1000 as 'round_minutes', logsourcename(logsourceid) as 'LogSource', dateformat(starttime, 'dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:00') as 'DateByMinute', sum(eventcount)/60 as 'TotalEventsEPS', count(*)/60 as 'CoalescedEventsEPS' from events
where
logsourceid>69
and DateByMinute in
(select DateByMinute from (select dateformat(starttime, 'dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:00') as 'DateByMinute', sum(eventcount)/60 as 'TotalEventsEPS', count(*)/60 as 'CoalescedEventsEPS'
from events
where
logsourceid > 69
group by DateByMinute
last 12 hours)
where
(TotalEventsEPS > {Maximum EPS} or CoalescedEventsEPS > {Maximum EPS}))
group by LogSource, DateByMinute
having (TotalEventsEPS > ({Maximum EPS}*{Percentage of maximum EPS}/100) or CoalescedEventsEPS > ({Maximum EPS}*{Percentage of maximum EPS}/100))
order by round_minutes, TotalEventsEPS desc
last 12 hours

list.name: EPS Total by Log Source timeline

query.queryVal:
select min(starttime/1000)*1000 as 'round_minutes', logsourcename(logsourceid) as 'LogSource',dateformat(starttime, 'dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:00') as 'DateByMinute', sum(eventcount)/60 as 'TotalEventsEPS', count(*)/60 as 'CoalescedEventsEPS' from events
where
logsourceid>69
group by LogSource,DateByMinute
order by round_minutes desc
last 30 minutes
